scripts._config: envsubst < subgraph-template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && envsubst < Constants-template.ts > src/Constants.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn config:mainnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service otterclam/otto
scripts.deploy:mainnet-backup: yarn config:mainnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service otterclam/otto_backup
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn config:testnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service otterclam/otto_testnet
scripts.deploy:testnet-dev: yarn config:testnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service otterclam/otto-dev-testnet
scripts.deploy:xxxxx: yarn config:xxxxx && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service d0c0q/xxxxx
scripts.deploy:perf: yarn config:xxxxx && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service d0c0q/otto_perf
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn config:mainnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --product hosted-service otterclam/otto-dev
scripts.deploy:local: yarn create:local && yarn config:local && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 otterclam/otto
scripts.deploy:fork: yarn create:fork && yarn config:fork && yarn codegen && yarn build && graph deploy otterclam/otto-fork --debug-fork QmfL624wbs4tEeTEUdCE4ks4fW2Nq9rCpLt4Y1v5UJRhdx --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001
